arts.ttl: Paul Warne reveals what players really thought after spirited Derby County lose to Leeds United
arts.sum: Paul Warne believes Derby County's disappointment at not snatching a result against Leeds United shows how far they've come. Asked for his assessment of the game, Warne said: "I thought in the first 10 minutes we showed them too much respect, and it looked like it was going to be a long evening, but after the first 10 minutes, I thought we settled in the game okay," he said.

arts.ttl: Leeds United looking to snatch Burnley winger amid transfer interest in Ligue 1 defender
arts.sum: Get Leeds United news to your phone with our WhatsApp community Leeds United are said to be eyeing a potential move for Burnley forward Mike Tresor.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Leeds United as duo score 8/10 but Rams beaten - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Curtis Nelson: Got tight, got aggressive and tried to keep Leeds at bay where their rotation and pace caused problems, particularly in the first 15 minutes when Derby couldn't get out of their own half. Curtis Nelson then saw a chance from a corner palmed away by Illan Meslier but the breakthrough Leeds craved arrived 12 minutes from time when Brenden Aaronson skipped through following a smart exchange of passes that allowed him to beat Zetterstrom and seal the points.

arts.ttl: Leeds unlock stubborn Derby with 'goal of the season' to go top
arts.sum: Daniel Farke hailed Brenden Aaronson's late winner as the "goal of the season" after he slotted home at the end of a stunning move to send Leeds top of the Championship with a 1-0 victory at Derby County.

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings vs Derby County after Meslier wonder save and Aaronson winner
arts.sum: Daniel Farke's side started the second half better with Brenden Aaronson denied by a good save. Much better in open play during the second 45 minutes but was perhaps harshly subbed as Farke looked for a winner.

arts.ttl: 'What a goal that is!' | Leeds score SUPERB winner at Derby
arts.sum: Brenden Aaronson scores the opening goal for Leeds against Derby after an incredible build-up.

arts.ttl: Patrick Bamford told what needs to happen for him to leave Leeds United
arts.sum: The future of Patrick Bamford will depend on whether or not Leeds United allow Joe Gelhardt to leave in January, according to reports. Bamford has enjoyed some incredible highs during his time as a Leeds player, including netting 16 goals to fire them to Premier League promotion in 2019/20 — followed up with 17 goals […] The post Patrick Bamford told what needs to happen for him to leave Leeds United appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Leeds United team news vs Derby County as Daniel Farke makes controversial choice
arts.sum: Leeds United manager Daniel Farke has made four changes from the side that beat Stoke City last time out. Farke has chosen to stick with the same back line that kept a clean sheet in the Potteries but has chosen to make a swap in midfield as Joe Rothwell drops out and Ao Tanaka comes in to partner Ethan Ampadu in the double pivot.

arts.ttl: Chris Wilder takes long-term view as Leeds United have chance to take Championship lead
arts.sum: First-half goals from Andre Brooks and Karlan Grant meant the points were shared, and moved the Blades to the top of the Championship table ahead of Leeds United's game with Derby County this evening. "We have to win but today what I learnt about my team was so pleasing," he said.

arts.ttl: Famous music star talks about her Leeds United love and experiencing those big Champions League nights
arts.sum: Emma-Jean Thackray, 35, who has recently released new track Black Hole, with Reggie Watts, has spoken to the BBC about how important Leeds United is to her. A famous Leeds United fan has opened up on her time growing up as a supporter and experiencing those famous Champions League nights at Elland Road.
